full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 FAR EAST PLACEMENT AGENCY (U.S.A) (TAIWAN AGENCY) FAR EAST INTERNATIONAL CO., LTD. NO. 12, LANE 42, SECTION 2, CHUNG SAN ROAD N. TAIPEI, TAIWAN, CHINA. TELEPHONE 47475 660038 OVERSEAS DOMESTIC APPLICATION FORM NO.TW Please attach 3 halfsize 1. State New York. 4. Washington, D. C. and 1 fullsize photographs 2. Connecticut. 5. Los Angeles. 3. Pennsylvania. 6. California. PLEASE WRITE IN BLOCK LETTERS CLEARLY Position required General housework/ 1. Surname Betty Mao Christian Name Child care woman 2. Address No. 8, Lane 95, Shui Yuan Street, Taipei, 3. Date of Birth Oct. 27, 1914 4. Place of Birth Shanghai 5. Age 52 6. Nationality Chinese 7. Religion Budda 8. Height 5 Ft. 2 inches. 9. Weight/lb 138 10. Color of Hair Black 11. Marital Status Married 12. No. of Dependant relatives 1 13. Have you, ever lived in any country outside Taiwan for 6 months or more? If so, give details No 14. Do you smoke? Yes 15. Do you Drink? No Please note that two columns should be completed in Questions 16-39. either "Will" and "Have Done" or "Will" and "Will Learn" in the tasks you are prepared to undertake. Have Will Have Will Will Will Done Learn Done Learn 16. Take care of Babies V V 26. Set Table. V V Assist with Babies. V V Help 17. Look after children V 27. Serve at table V V from age 1-5 years. (informal) V V Assist with above. V V 28. Mend Children's Clothes V V 18. Look after children V V 29. Assist with cooking from age 5-10 years. 30. Do plain cooking V V 19. Work where there are V V 31. Thorough knowledge children over 10 yrs. of English cooking 20. Bathe children. V V 32. Do. advanced cooking V V 21. Do general housework V V (English or Chinese) Assist with above V V 33. Prepare children's V V 22. Do general laundering V V Special diets. Assist with above V V 34. Prepare invalid's diets. 23. Do hand laundering V V 35. Look after invalids 24. Sew 36. Assist with above 25. Iron. V V 37. Can you swim,? Yes/ No. If not, Are you willing to learn? Nes/No. 38. Can you Drive.? Y/ES/ No. If not, Are you willing to learn? Yes/No. 39. Can you speak English. Good/Broken English/Understandable. This experience need not necessarily have been gained with an employer, so please give ANY domestic experience whether it be professionally or at home, for friends or relatives. I have more than 30 years experience in domestic work, about 20 years worked in my own home and 10 years worked for American families.
